00049 /* _____STANDARD INCLUDES____________________________________________________ */
00050 // include types & constants of Wiring core API
00051 #include "WProgram.h"
00052 
00053 
00054 /* _____UTILITY MACROS_______________________________________________________ */
00055 #ifndef lowWord(ww)
00058 #define lowWord(ww) ((uint16_t) ((ww) & 0xFFFF))
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 // Macro to return high word of a 32-bit integer
00062 #ifndef highWord(ww)
00063 #define highWord(ww) ((uint16_t) ((ww) >> 16))
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 // Macro to generate 32-bit integer from (2) 16-bit words
00067 #ifndef LONG(hi, low)
00068 #define LONG(hi, lo) ((uint32_t) ((hi) << 16 | (lo)))
00069 #endif
00070 
00071 
00072 /* _____PROJECT INCLUDES_____________________________________________________ */
00073 // functions to calculate Modbus Application Data Unit CRC
00074 #include <util/crc16.h>
00075

00082 class ModbusMaster
00083 {
00084   public:
00085     ModbusMaster();
00086     ModbusMaster(uint8_t);
00087     ModbusMaster(uint8_t, uint8_t);
00088     void begin();

00090     
00091     // Modbus exception codes
00104     static const uint8_t ku8MBIllegalFunction            = 0x01;
00105 
00124     static const uint8_t ku8MBIllegalDataAddress         = 0x02;
00125     
00139     static const uint8_t ku8MBIllegalDataValue           = 0x03;
00140     
00149     static const uint8_t ku8MBSlaveDeviceFailure         = 0x04;
00150 
00151     // Class-defined success/exception codes
00164     static const uint8_t ku8MBSuccess                    = 0x00;
00165     
00173     static const uint8_t ku8MBInvalidSlaveID             = 0xE0;
00174     
00182     static const uint8_t ku8MBInvalidFunction            = 0xE1;
00183     
00192     static const uint8_t ku8MBResponseTimedOut           = 0xE2;
00193     
00201     static const uint8_t ku8MBInvalidCRC                 = 0xE3;
00202     
00203     uint16_t GetResponseBuffer(uint8_t);
00204     void ClearResponseBuffer();
00205     uint8_t SetTransmitBuffer(uint8_t, uint16_t);
00206     void ClearTransmitBuffer();
00207     
00208     uint8_t ReadCoils(uint16_t, uint16_t);
00209     uint8_t ReadDiscreteInputs(uint16_t, uint16_t);
00210     uint8_t ReadHoldingRegisters(uint16_t, uint16_t);
00211     uint8_t ReadInputRegisters(uint16_t, uint8_t);
00212     uint8_t WriteSingleCoil(uint16_t, uint8_t);
00213     uint8_t WriteSingleRegister(uint16_t, uint16_t);
00214     uint8_t WriteMultipleCoils(uint16_t, uint16_t);
00215     uint8_t WriteMultipleRegisters(uint16_t, uint16_t);
00216     uint8_t MaskWriteRegister(uint16_t, uint16_t, uint16_t);

00218       
00219

00221     uint8_t  _u8SerialPort;                                      
00222     uint8_t  _u8MBSlave;                                         
00223     uint16_t _u16BaudRate;                                       
00224     static const uint8_t ku8MaxBufferSize                = 64;   
00225     uint16_t _u16ReadAddress;                                    
00226     uint16_t _u16ReadQty;                                        
00227     uint16_t _u16ResponseBuffer[ku8MaxBufferSize];               
00228     uint16_t _u16WriteAddress;                                   
00229     uint16_t _u16WriteQty;                                       
00230     uint16_t _u16TransmitBuffer[ku8MaxBufferSize];               
00231     
00232     // Modbus function codes for bit access
00233     static const uint8_t ku8MBReadCoils                  = 0x01; 
00234     static const uint8_t ku8MBReadDiscreteInputs         = 0x02; 
00235     static const uint8_t ku8MBWriteSingleCoil            = 0x05; 
00236     static const uint8_t ku8MBWriteMultipleCoils         = 0x0F; 
00237 
00238     // Modbus function codes for 16 bit access
00239     static const uint8_t ku8MBReadHoldingRegisters       = 0x03; 
00240     static const uint8_t ku8MBReadInputRegisters         = 0x04; 
00241     static const uint8_t ku8MBWriteSingleRegister        = 0x06; 
00242     static const uint8_t ku8MBWriteMultipleRegisters     = 0x10; 
00243     static const uint8_t ku8MBMaskWriteRegister          = 0x16; 
00244     static const uint8_t ku8MBReadWriteMultipleRegisters = 0x17; 
00245     
00246     // Modbus timeout [milliseconds]
00247     static const uint8_t ku8MBResponseTimeout            = 200;  
00248     
00249     // master function that conducts Modbus transactions
00250     uint8_t ModbusMasterTransaction(uint8_t u8MBFunction);
00251 };
